html: (2 Nephi 8:24; 3 Nephi 20:36; Moroni 10:31)."Beautiful garments." In an 1832 revelation the Lord declared, "Zion must increase in beauty, and in holiness; … Zion must arise and put on her beautiful garments." As noted above, Zion puts on her strength through the authority of the priesthood. When that priesthood is exercised in righteousness, Zion puts on or displays "her beautiful garments." (See DCE, 40.) This verse may also be a reference to sacred garments that are provided in holy places; perhaps when we put on our "beautiful garments" we remember sacred covenants and the need to keep ourselves worthy to enter into the presence of God.
